portfolio.title: Sports Wordle
portfolio.description: ReactJS application which is a remix of the famous wordle game but using sport related words instead

portfolio.title: F1 Blog
portfolio.description: A ReactJS blog dedicated to formula one, allowing addition, deletion and filtering of blogs.

portfolio.title: Restaurant
portfolio.description: A restaurant application built using HTML and PHP which accomodates for the needs of customers, waiters and chefs.

portfolio.title: Infix / Postfix Calculator
portfolio.description: A Calculator app built using Java and JavaFX. The application allows the use of both infix and postfix notation in real time.
